name: Tinger Calc
summary: Tinger Calc is a powerful scientific calculator environment.
short_description: Tinger Calc is a powerful scientific calculator environment. It supports elementary math ( +, -, *, /, ^), trigonometric functions (sin, sinh, asin, cos, cosh, acos, tan, tanh, atan), exponential functions (exp, ln, lg, sqrt), math constants (pi, e), system functions (exit, quit, print). The software support email: tingersoft@gmail.com.
